They do not comprise a management system or a comprehensive set of processes for project management, as that is not the scope of this document. The Technical Management processes consist of the following: a) Project Planning process; b) Project Assessment and Control process; c) Decision Management process; d) Risk Management process; e) Configuration Management process; f) Information Management process; g) Measurement process; and h) Quality Assurance process.
